rows.label: qst702609_msg0001
rows.name:
So there was gold buried in the Dannagh
Desert... The legend was true!

rows.label: qst702609_msg0002
rows.name:
Parvi, I'm glad your
dream came true, mo!

rows.label: qst702609_msg0003
rows.name: ...Was it?

rows.label: qst702609_msg0004
rows.name:
Didn't it just scrape together
some gold coins dropped by
merchants and travelers...?

rows.label: qst702609_msg0005
rows.name: It was quite a small sum...

rows.label: qst702609_msg0006
rows.name: ...Don't confront me with reality!

rows.label: qst702609_msg0007
rows.name:
I worked so hard, but I
couldn't get any gold...

rows.label: qst702609_msg0008
rows.name:
At this rate, I might have
made more money taking care
of Armus in the capital...

rows.label: qst702609_msg0009
rows.name: That's so sad...

rows.label: qst702609_msg0010
rows.name: ...But Dudan had fun, mo.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0011
rows.name: You're right...

rows.label: qst702609_msg0012
rows.name: I had fun too.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0013
rows.name:
Everyone, thank you for helping,
even though it was all for nothing.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0014
rows.name: No, it's fine.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0015
rows.name: We had fun too.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0016
rows.name: Yeah.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0017
rows.name: We all had a good dream, mo...

rows.label: qst702609_msg0101
rows.name:
Wh-wh-what?! Bugs?! A whole
bunch of bugs came out?!

rows.label: qst702609_msg0102
rows.name: Gross! Throw them all away!

rows.label: qst702609_msg0103
rows.name:
That's not right, Parvi, mo! These
are very valuable insects, mo!

rows.label: qst702609_msg0104
rows.name: What do you mean?

rows.label: qst702609_msg0105
rows.name:
The insects that just swarmed out
are called Dannagh Wetas, mo.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0106
rows.name:
They're quite rare in Iira.
They're used in special remedies
and high-end perfumes.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0107
rows.name:
That's right, mo. That's why they're
traded at very high prices, mo.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0108
rows.name: So if we sell them...

rows.label: qst702609_msg0109
rows.name: We'll be rich?!

rows.label: qst702609_msg0110
rows.name: That's right, mo!

rows.label: qst702609_msg0111
rows.name: We did it!

rows.label: qst702609_msg0112
rows.name: We did it, mo!

rows.label: qst702609_msg0113
rows.name:
Let's go back to the capital
and have a big party!

rows.label: qst702609_msg0114
rows.name:
We'll drink and eat and party
as much as we want, mo!

rows.label: qst702609_msg0115
rows.name:
I wonder if this is what the gold
buried in the Dannagh Desert was?

rows.label: qst702609_msg0116
rows.name: Probably...

rows.label: qst702609_msg0117
rows.name:
It's not uncommon for ancient people
to describe rare, medicinal insects
as being as valuable as gold.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0118
rows.name:
That's right. There are
similar stories in Superbia.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0119
rows.name: Oh really?

rows.label: qst702609_msg0120
rows.name:
It might have been a coincidence,
but Marco did a good job.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0121
rows.name: Yes... and it was interesting.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0122
rows.name:
Maybe legends are unraveled by
such strange coincidences...

rows.label: qst702609_msg0123
rows.name: Haha, maybe so.

rows.label: qst702609_msg0124
rows.name:
Looking at those two,
I really think so...
